item.title: /*Equipment Level Checking*/
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 2677) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 2678) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 2679) { return 99; }
Fixed.

item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Try this

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } else if (ItemID == 2677) { return 99; } else if (ItemID == 2678) { } return 99; else if (ItemID == 2679) { return 99; }

item.title: /*Equipment Level Checking*/
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

I’ve tried to add more than one item to require 99 Attack, so I added this.

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 2677) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 2678) { } return 99; if (ItemID == 2679) { return 99; }

And compiled and got…

client.java:27441: unreachable statement if (ItemID == 2679) { ^
